attributes.action: Close all meat shops and shops
attributes.additional_details: I want them closeing down till this hard time has blown over
attributes.background: I want all meat shops closed who have put there meat up and superstores who have put there prices up

rejection.details:
Since this petition was created, the Government has announced that non-essential shops are to close. 

If you want the Government and Parliament to restrict people from selling items at inflated prices, you may wish to sign this petition:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303070

The Government has asked everyone to stay at home. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

You can find out more about how to protect yourself and others from coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
